text: Krystyna Maria Łybacka (10 February 1946 – 20 April 2020) was a Polish politician. She was the Minister of National Education from 2001 to 2004. She also served as a member of the national parliament (Sejm) from 1991 to 2014. She was born in Jutrosin. Łybacka died on 20 April 2020 at the age of 74. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1946 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Polish politicians
title: Krystyna Łybacka
